org.jooby.spec

Interface RouteParam


  • public interface RouteParam
    Route param attributes: name, type, etc...
    Author:
    edgar

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<String> doc() 
      String name() 
      default boolean optional() 
      RouteParamType paramType() 
      Type type() 
      Object value() 

    • Method Detail

      • name

        String name()
        Returns:
        Parameter's name.

      • type

        Type type()
        Returns:
        Java type.

      • paramType

        RouteParamType paramType()
        Returns:
        Type of HTTP param.

      • value

        Object value()
        Returns:
        Default value or null

      • doc

        Optional<String> doc()
        Returns:
        Documentation.

      • optional

        default boolean optional()
        Returns:
        True for optional param. A param is optional when type is Optional or has a default value.
